遞.definition: to hand over; to pass on; to deliver; (bound form) progressively; in the proper order

遞交.definition: to present; to give; to hand over; to hand in; to lay before

遞增.definition: to increase by degrees; in increasing order; incremental; progressive

遞嬗.definition: (literary) to go through successive changes; to evolve

遞減.definition: progressively decreasing; gradually falling; in descending order

遞眼色.definition: to give sb a meaningful look

遞給.definition: to hand it (i.e. the aforementioned item) to (sb)

遞補.definition: to substitute; to complement in the proper order; to fill vacancies progressively

遞解.definition: to escort a criminal under guard (in former times)

遞進.definition: gradual progress; to go forward one stage at a time

遞降.definition: to go down by degrees; progressively decreasing
